rooms.description: Large entrance with a welcoming atmosphere and natural light. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main door in a favorable direction.
Spacious living area adjacent to the central courtyard with Mediterranean style detailing and an open layout for family interaction.
Adjacent to the living room with views of the courtyard; designed to promote social interactions while respecting Vastu guidelines for dining spaces.
Private bedroom featuring a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom. Positioned in accordance with Vastu recommendations for privacy and relaxation.
Comfortable guest room with ample space and storage, ensuring a pleasant stay for visitors while following local norms.
Designated bedroom for children, safe and airy space with natural light, keeping in mind family needs and Vastu principles of prosperity.
Functional kitchen area integrated into the villa design with open access to the dining area and courtyard. Incorporates modern Mediterranean elements and respects Vastu for food preparation areas.
Open concept dining and kitchen space promoting family engagement while meeting building norms for integrated spaces.
A beautifully landscaped courtyard serving as a focal point of the villa. Provides natural light to adjacent rooms and promotes energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom designed with privacy and comfort, adhering to building standards and Vastu guidelines for water elements.
Well-appointed guest bathroom adjacent to guest bedroom, ensuring convenience and compliance with local norms.
A dedicated area for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance equipment. Designed to be unobtrusive yet functional.
Spacious garage accommodating two vehicles with additional workspace. Built in accordance with local building codes and Vastu guidelines for utility spaces.
